name: Testing & Accessibility
goal: Ensure all features work correctly in both themes with proper accessibility

prds.description: Test all game modes (Daily, Practice, Locate) in both themes
steps: Start Daily Challenge in dark theme - verify it works
Switch to light theme mid-game - verify no visual breaks
Start Practice Mode in light theme - verify it works
Switch to dark theme mid-game - verify no visual breaks
Start Locate Mode in both themes - verify map interaction works

prds.description: Test difficulty levels in both themes
steps: Set difficulty to Easy in dark theme
Verify distance + direction both show
Switch to light theme
Verify distance + direction still show correctly
Test Medium and Hard difficulties in both themes
Verify all difficulty feedback is visible

prds.description: Verify color contrast meets WCAG AA standards
steps: Use browser DevTools contrast checker
Check text-on-background contrast in light theme (should be 4.5:1 minimum)
Check text-on-background contrast in dark theme (should be 4.5:1 minimum)
Check button/interactive element contrast in both themes
Verify no contrast issues in either theme

prds.description: Test theme switching mid-game doesn't break state
steps: Start game in dark theme
Make 3 guesses
Switch to light theme
Verify all 3 previous guesses are still visible
Make 3 more guesses in light theme
Switch back to dark theme
Verify all 6 guesses are visible and styled correctly

prds.description: Browser compatibility testing (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
steps: Open game in Chrome - test theme switching
Open game in Firefox - test theme switching
Open game in Safari - test theme switching (especially backdrop-filter)
Open game in Edge - test theme switching
Verify localStorage persists theme in all browsers
